area: Mull of Kintyre to Ardnamurchan Point (15)

forecast.wind: Northwest 5 to 7, occasionally gale 8 at first, backing west 3 to 5 later then south 5 to 7 later.
forecast.sea: Moderate or rough, but slight or moderate in shelter, becoming very rough for a time near western islay and western Tiree.
forecast.weather: Rain then showers, becoming fair later.
